body: Poet and blogger Yarisa Col贸n comments on the event "Poetry is Busy" [es] at the Museum of Contemporary Art in San Juan: "It was a wonderful night. I read in front of people (40+) as if I was reading to my sister in the room, comfortably. I read with happiness. Connected with my internal game."
